snippet: The pursuit of “work-life balance,” which sounds so wholesome and reasonable, can be a zero-sum game in the office.
abstract: Pursuit of work-life balance, which sounds so wholesome and reasonable, can be a zero-sum game in the office; some employees have come to expect that the demands of their children, in particular, will be accommodated, and not all of their colleagues are happy about it; tensions are not new, but at a time when many Americans are struggling to find or keep jobs, the issue has come to the fore.
lead_paragraph: The pursuit of “work-life balance,” which sounds so wholesome and reasonable, can be a zero-sum game in the office.

headline.main: When the Work-Life Scales Are Unequal
